identity.archetype: The Sovereign (Authority & Excellence) mixed with The Creator (Innovation)

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Manrope:wght@400;500;700&family=Playfair+Display:ital,wght@0,400;0,600;0,700;1,400&display=swap');

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-sm px-8 py-4 text-sm font-semibold tracking-wide transition-all shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-sm px-8 py-4 text-sm font-semibold tracking-wide transition-all
buttons.outline: border border-white/30 text-white hover:bg-white/10 rounded-sm px-8 py-4 transition-all

cards.service: group relative p-8 bg-white border border-slate-100 hover:border-slate-300 hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 flex flex-col items-start justify-between h-full overflow-hidden
cards.product: bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 p-8 hover:bg-white hover:shadow-lg transition-all

inputs.default: h-12 bg-white border-slate-200 focus:ring-slate-900 focus:border-slate-900 rounded-sm

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

images.alt: NYC Empire State Building at Dusk
images.usage: Hero section background with dark overlay

general: Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable (p-12, p-16).
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover states, transitions).
Use 'Playfair Display' for Headings to evoke premium trust.
Use 'Manrope' for body text for optimal readability.
Primary CTA buttons should be solid Navy (#0F172A).
Secondary actions should be outlined or ghost.
accessibility: Ensure text contrast ratio is at least 4.5:1.
All interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present.
Use semantic HTML5 tags (section, article, nav, aside).
testing: All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute (kebab-case).

instructions_to_main_agent: Install 'clsx' and 'tailwind-merge' for class handling if not present.
Ensure the Navbar is sticky with a glassmorphism effect.
Footer should be deep navy (bg-slate-900) with white text.
Use the provided image URLs strictly. Do not use placeholders.
